template.source:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd"> <mapper namespace="kr.co.dreamlabs">
<resultMap id="ResultMap_#ENTITY_NAME#" type="#pakage#.bean.#Service#Bean"> <result property="NO" column="NO"></result> #begin# <result property="#field_name#" column="#field_name#"></result>#end#
<!-- <result property="sys_cr_user_nm" column="sys_cr_user_nm"></result> --> <!-- <result property="sys_ud_user_nm" column="sys_ud_user_nm"></result> --> </resultMap>
<select id="SELECT_#ENTITY_NAME#" resultMap="ResultMap_#ENTITY_NAME#" parameterType="#pakage#.bean.#Service#ParmBean"> SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ROWID DESC) NO #begin# ,#field_name##end#
<!-- ,to_char(sys_cr_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as sys_cr_dt ,to_char(sys_ud_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as sys_ud_dt -->
<!-- ,CC_FC_GETUSERNAME(sys_cr_user_id) as sys_cr_user_nm --> <!-- ,CC_FC_GETUSERNAME(sys_ud_user_id) as sys_ud_user_nm -->
FROM #entity_name# <where> #begin# <if test="#field_name# != null">AND #field_name#=#{#field_name#}</if>#end# #begin# <if test="_#field_name# != null">AND #field_name# like '%'||#{_#field_name#}||'%'</if>#end#
</where> </select>
<select id="SELECT_#ENTITY_NAME#_PAGE" resultMap="ResultMap_#ENTITY_NAME#" parameterType="#pakage#.bean.#Service#ParmBean"> SELECT * FROM ( SELECT <if test="ORDERBY != null"> ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ${ORDERBY}) NO </if> <if test="ORDERBY == null"> ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ROWID DESC) NO </if> #begin# ,#field_name##end#
<!-- ,to_char(sys_cr_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as sys_cr_dt ,to_char(sys_ud_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as sys_ud_dt -->
<!-- ,CC_FC_GETUSERNAME(sys_cr_user_id) as sys_cr_user_nm --> <!-- ,CC_FC_GETUSERNAME(sys_ud_user_id) as sys_ud_user_nm -->
FROM #entity_name# <where> #begin# <if test="#field_name# != null">AND #field_name#=#{#field_name#}</if>#end# #begin# <if test="_#field_name# != null">AND #field_name# like '%'||#{_#field_name#}||'%'</if>#end#
</where> ) LIST
<if test="CURPAGE != null"> WHERE NO BETWEEN ((#{CURPAGE}-1) * #{RCOUNT})+1 AND (#{CURPAGE} * #{RCOUNT}) </if>
</select>
<select id="SELECT_#ENTITY_NAME#_COUNT" resultType="int" parameterType="#pakage#.bean.#Service#ParmBean"> SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #entity_name# <where> #begin# <if test="#field_name# != null">AND #field_name#=#{#field_name#}</if>#end# #begin# <if test="_#field_name# != null">AND #field_name# like '%'||#{_#field_name#}||'%'</if>#end#
</where> </select>
<insert id="INSERT_#ENTITY_NAME#"> INSERT INTO #ENTITY_NAME#( sys_cr_dt , sys_ud_dt #begin# , #key_fields# #end# #begin# <if test="#field_name# != null">, #field_name#</if>#end# ) VALUES( systimestamp , systimestamp #begin# , #{#key_fields#} #end# #begin# <if test="#field_name# != null">, #{#field_name#}</if>#end# ) </insert>
<delete id="DELETE_#ENTITY_NAME#"> DELETE FROM #ENTITY_NAME# <where> #begin# AND #key_fields# = #{#key_fields#} #end# </where> </delete>
<update id="UPDATE_#ENTITY_NAME#"> UPDATE #ENTITY_NAME# <set> sys_ud_dt = systimestamp #begin# <if test="#field_name# != null">, #field_name#=#{#field_name#}</if>#end# </set> <where> #begin# AND #key_fields# = #{#key_fields#} #end# </where> </update>
</mapper>
